StringTable.String: Nossa crescente familiaridade com os campos de força nos permitiu substituir nossos sistemas mecânicos de suporte de vida por processadores mais elegantes baseados em campo. Os alimentos agora são armazenados em um único bloco de lodo rico em nutrientes, canalizado diretamente para a boca do usuário.

StringTable.Label: MasterSupportFieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Suporte ao Domínio de Campo

StringTable.Label: MasterSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de módulos de suporte de vida da frota.

StringTable.Label: MasterSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossa mudança para sistemas de suporte de vida baseados em campo tornou possível a descarga de alguns materiais para outros navios. Além disso, agora deve ser possível complementar as frotas através de sondas de abastecimento não tripuladas lançadas de uma instalação devidamente equipada.

StringTable.Label: MasterPromethionSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Sistemas de Apoio Promethion

StringTable.Label: MasterPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de sistemas de suporte de vida exóticos.

StringTable.Label: MasterPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: O Promethion Support System estende ainda mais nosso suporte de vida em campo, com todos os requisitos para um organismo vivo - oxigênio, água e alimentos - agora canalizado diretamente para esse organismo em vez de ser deixado a flutuar e entrar no equipamento.

StringTable.Label: MasterExplorationExtention_Name
StringTable.String: Extensão de Exploração

StringTable.Label: MasterExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de módulos avançados de suporte de vida da frota.

StringTable.Label: MasterExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: Adaptamos a mais recente tecnologia em campo de apoio Promethion para ser usada por nossas embarcações de apoio à frota, aumentando assim o alcance de viagens de toda uma frota. Além disso, fizemos melhorias significativas em nossos módulos de extensão de suporte de vida da base estelar.

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Sistemas de suporte sem perdas

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção dos mais modernos sistemas de suporte de vida.

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Nossos sistemas de suporte de vida estão agora próximos da perfeição, não desperdiçando nenhum recurso e reciclando essencialmente todos os produtos residuais. Como um bônus adicional, os campos foram reduzidos em tamanho e agora são muito menos humilhantes para a tripulação.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalManufacturing_Name
StringTable.String: Manufatura orbital

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de um casco de tamanho maior.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: A mudança de nossas operações de construção de navios para ambientes de microgravidade permitirá eventualmente a construção de estruturas maciças. Ainda não chegamos lá, mas o primeiro passo para sair do poço será sempre o maior.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Construção de Nave Estelar Especializada

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta a fabricação do estaleiro.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Você não pode colocar qualquer um em um terno espacial e fazê-los construir coisas em órbita. Acontece que a maioria das pessoas não entende o que é uma órbita. Alguns programas de treinamento melhorados devem melhorar drasticamente nossa capacidade de fabricação orbital.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Especialização Orbital

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Melhora a logística.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Agora que vimos alguns projetos de construção se desmoronarem acidentalmente, identificamos uma série de melhorias possíveis que podemos fazer em nossas técnicas de construção orbital.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Logística melhorada

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Incrementa a logística.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Colocar o material na órbita certa na hora certa é algo que só agora estamos conseguindo dominar. Acontece que as manobras de mudança de plano orbital são realmente caras. Mas uma vez que aumentamos esta escala, nossa capacidade logística deve melhorar muito.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Maximização do armazenamento

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta a capacidade do casco.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ironicamente, o espaço está a um prêmio no espaço, pelo menos dentro de nossos cascos. Mesmo pequenas melhorias na eficiência da carga valem o esforço de caçá-los.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Construção com Gravidade Zero

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de cascos médios.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: A maioria de nossas tentativas iniciais de construção de micro-gravidade utilizou variações desajeitadas de técnicas baseadas no solo, não muito distantes de bater nas rochas em conjunto. Agora que temos um pouco mais de experiência, devemos ser capazes de construir em uma escala muito maior.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Reforço do casco

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta os pontos de impacto do casco.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Depois de doar alguns cascos para a prática de armas, pudemos ver os danos estruturais infligidos a eles e identificar reforços estruturais que deveriam endurecer substancialmente cada navio.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Otimização por gravidade zero

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Melhora os cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Demos um grande passo em frente com nossa mais recente adoção de práticas de construção verdadeiramente de gravidade zero. Agora, após alguns testes e um pequeno acidente, nossos engenheiros identificaram outras áreas a serem melhoradas.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Eficiência do estaleiro

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz o custo dos cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: O planejamento do local de trabalho em um ambiente orbital é um negócio seriamente complicado, mas agora que temos o jeito, devemos ver uma significativa economia de custos para cada casco que construímos.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Cascos de alta capacidade

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta a capacidade do casco.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Agora somos capazes de construir elementos estruturais ocos ainda capazes de lidar com cargas de compressão muito altas. Ao maximizar o uso destes e rotear vários sistemas auxiliares da nave através das cavidades, podemos economizar espaço para equipamentos de missão crítica.

StringTable.Label: MasterLargeScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Construção em larga escala

StringTable.Label: MasterLargeScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de grandes cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: A construção de cascos maiores está mais envolvida do que apenas adicionar mais coisas a eles. Assegurar que eles não desabem sob aceleração é um sério desafio. Sentar, para garantir que nossas tripulações não desabem sob aceleração é outro desafio surpreendente.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Cascos temperados

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta os pontos de impacto do casco.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Parece contra-intuitivo, mas introduzindo fraquezas muito pequenas na estrutura molecular de nossos cascos, podemos torná-los deformáveis de forma controlada, tornando nossos cascos um pouco mais resistentes.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Foco na construção orbital

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Melhora os cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Estamos ficando cada vez melhores a cada dia que passa, e uma série de práticas de projeto mais eficientes está começando a aparecer nas mesas de desenho de nossos engenheiros. Junto com os rabiscos ofensivos que sempre estiveram presentes.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Foco na fabricação de navios estelares

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz o custo dos cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A última geração de equipamentos de fabricação com propulsão própria permitirá que nossos trabalhadores possam manobrar dentro dos cascos com muito mais facilidade, reduzindo o desafio e as despesas de construção.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Foco na capacidade do casco

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta a capacidade do casco.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: À medida que nossos cascos cresceram, começamos a perder um pouco da arte de embalar que nossos antecessores tinham. Mas agora, graças à escala de nossos navios, mesmo pequenas melhorias na embalagem podem levar a mais espaço para tudo o mais.

StringTable.Label: MasterMassiveScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Construção em escala maciça

StringTable.Label: MasterMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permite a construção de enormes cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Estamos construindo navios enormes capazes de apagar as estrelas. Obviamente, qualquer navio pode apagar as estrelas se você chegar perto o suficiente. Só não é preciso chegar muito perto delas para que isso aconteça. Nem você gostaria de fazê-lo.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Mestres de Navegação

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduz o custo dos cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Que construímos as melhores naves da galáxia é inegável, mas que o fazemos de forma econômica é o que realmente é impressionante. Nossos inimigos nunca foram tão ameaçados.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Domínio do casco

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Melhora os cascos.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Ainda estamos encontrando maneiras de melhorar nossos estaleiros, embora eles já sejam a inveja da galáxia civilizada. Na galáxia incivilizada eles são um pouco menos invejados, mas nós nunca nos demos bem com esses caras de qualquer forma.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Maximização do casco

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumenta a capacidade do casco.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Graças aos avanços na área do frezamento, nunca antes nossos navios haviam sido tão frezados com armas. Eles também poderiam ser tão resistentes a outras coisas que supomos.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditions_Name
StringTable.String: Tradições de Precursores

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Aumentar a produção e a qualidade do estaleiro naval.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditions_Dec
StringTable.String: Como herdeiros dos Precursores sabemos que nossos navios são mais do que nossas ferramentas, eles são nossos leais companheiros.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our ships will repair themselves in battle.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Though our ships are still no match for the great living beings that used to travel the stars, we have been able to learn enough to allow them to slowly heal on their own in battle.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our ships will repair themselves in battle.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With the lessons we have learned form the our Precursor Traditions, we have been able to find new ways to make our ships superior to all others.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Ships

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Logistics of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships can literally work together, even without our aid. This allows us to field more ships with less logistical expense, allowing our fleets to grow larger than any seen since the time of the Precursors.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Organic Materials

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Hit Points of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorTraditionSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The Organic Materials we use to create our ships, are not only more beautiful, but stronger.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorMysteries_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Mysteries

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorMysteries_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to build the Precursor Protection Field support module.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorMysteries_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered how to reproduce a powerful Precursor Artifact. Though difficult to produce, it can make almost any fleet nearly indestructible.

StringTable.Label: MasterLivingShipsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Living Ships

StringTable.Label: MasterLivingShipsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our ships no longer need to be Maintained, and will self heal

StringTable.Label: MasterLivingShipsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We are now able to create living ships. Unlike our pervious forays into artificial life, they have proven to be loyal and helpful companions.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullStrengthening_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Strengthening

StringTable.Label: MasterHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tougher hulls.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierTech_Name
StringTable.String: Carriers

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently, there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullRepairSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Repair Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Carrier Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves carriers.

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's nothing like doing something a few times to see how terrible you are at it. After a few hilarious mishaps, we've identified a few ways we can improve our carrier operations.

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian Drones

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: MasterCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tuff little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: MasterSelfHealingHulls_Name
StringTable.String: Self Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: MasterSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything as long as we don't ask too many questions about them. Nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases will be able to repair damage during battle itself.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighCapacityCarriers_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Carriers

StringTable.Label: MasterHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters, designed to be more compact and packable, and the improved repair, reloading, and recovery facilities that go with them, we're now able to deploy high-capacity carriers.

StringTable.Label: MasterRecovery_Name
StringTable.String: Recovery

StringTable.Label: MasterRecovery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Learn to make use of the resources already floating around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterRecovery_Dec
StringTable.String: There is plenty of perfectly good stuff out there in the galaxy that we can make use of. With a little effort, we can get our little hands on that stuff before anyone else does.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavenging_Name
StringTable.String: Scavenging

StringTable.Label: MasterScavenging_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost our Scavenging Rate when victorious in battle.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavenging_Dec
StringTable.String: Why build new ships? With a little repair work, you can use your enemy's ships against them.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Research Scavenging

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Use salvaged ships to boost Research per turn.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that if we carefully dismantle some of the enemy ships we salvage, we are able to learn some fun new tricks. This should greatly increase our research rates.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Scavenging Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get more out of the ships you scavenge

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our knack for salvaging ships comes in handy, but with a bit of work we can pry even more goodies out of them.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Structural Scavenging

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Use salvaged ships to strengthen your fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: After studying some of the ships we have scavenged we now realize that we might want to focus more on the integrity of our hulls. It seems to have the added advantage of keeping them in one piece.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Scavenging

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to repair scavenged ships quicker after battle.

StringTable.Label: MasterScavengingSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our crews have found new and exciting new ways to repair the ships they scavenge at a record pace. This has the added advantage of making repairs more efficient on their own ships as well.

StringTable.Label: MasterCreativeRecycling_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Recycling

StringTable.Label: MasterCreativeRecycling_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Scavenging Rate and boosts Military Production.

StringTable.Label: MasterCreativeRecycling_Dec
StringTable.String: Our fleets have become so efficient at scavenging enemy ships that they have found that found better ways to recycle these ships. This has given us a substantial boost to Manufacturing on all our colonies.

StringTable.Label: MasterUltimateScavengers_Name
StringTable.String: Ultimate Scavengers

StringTable.Label: MasterUltimateScavengers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts our Scavenging Rate when victorious in battles.

StringTable.Label: MasterUltimateScavengers_Dec
StringTable.String: Our fleets have learned where to exactly to hit in order to disable ships. As a result, our Scavenging Rates are at an all-time high.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarForgeTech_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Forge

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarForgeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the constuction of the Stellar Forge Improvement.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarForgeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are working on several exciting new ways to optimize the construction of our ships. By putting these researchers together in a single facility, we'll ensure these breakthroughs are made, and then filter out to all planets where our ships are constructed.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Slightly Increase the hit point of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing the efforts of our Stellar Forge teams on durability, we have found several techniques that can be used to increase the durability of all our ships, no matter where they are built.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Ship Construction

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: The Arcean researchers who labor in the Stellar Forge have requested direction on where to focus their research.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Fortification

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Substantially lowers the maintinance costs of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellerOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Stellar Forge teams have improved the durability, ease of access, and construction costs of every vital component within our ships. Our entire fleet should see substantially reduced maintenance costs now.

StringTable.Label: MasterRobustHullConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Robust Hull Construction

StringTable.Label: MasterRobustHullConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to build unique hull strengthening components.

StringTable.Label: MasterRobustHullConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Stellar Forge teams have found a way to install a portable version of the Integrity fields they use when building ships within the ship itself. This will increase each ship's hit points and greatly increase its rate of repair.

StringTable.Label: MasterArceanHullRepairSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Repair Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterArceanHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterArceanHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can now be used to conduct partial repairs as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonics_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitonics

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Hull Capacity of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our knowledge of gravity is far beyond that of any of this universe's native races. We have been able to apply it to our ship construction which allows us to carry more components of any kind.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Offensive Gravitonics

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduce the Mass of our weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By specializing in our gravitonic technologies, we have been able to shrink our weapons systems substantially, allowing us to carry more of them.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitonic Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduce the Mass of our weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Focusing our study of gravitonics can allow us to lower the mass of specialized systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Gravitonics

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduce the Mass of our defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By specializing in our gravitonic technologies, we have been able to shrink our defense systems substantially. Which allows us to better defend ourselves from this universe's natives.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: System Gravitonics

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduce the Mass of drive, life support and sensor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By specializing in our gravitonic technologies, we have been able to shrink the components required to explore the galaxy, giving us a substantial edge over the natives when looking for new worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicManipulating_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitonic Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicManipulating_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Hull Capacity of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicManipulating_Dec
StringTable.String: With further study, we have been able to push our knowledge of gravitonic to new levels. Our ships can now carry even more components of all kinds.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitonic Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Hull Capacity of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered mass and gravity to the point that our ships can new carry more equipment than any other race in this universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship, it's another thing to keep it running. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Logistical Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of space accountants are becoming trained as we speak, capable of improving logistical efficiencies most people would be too bored to ever notice.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases mining production.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: An asteroid mining operation is a ballet of activity, as boring machines, ore haulers, and repair drones swarm about an asteroid. Keeping these pieces moving is challenging, and improving the organization is a sure way to improve its output.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Shipyards

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces Shipyard decay rate.

StringTable.Label: MasterLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs humanity has ever created. Any improvement we can make to the management and operation of these beasts will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: MasterFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: MasterDeepSpaceLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well. The part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarMining_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't have ships without the resources to build them. The same can be said for lots of things actually. Improved mining technologies will benefit every aspect of our civilization. At least the aspects of our civilization which require building things.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEfficiencyMining_Name
StringTable.String: High Efficiency Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mining operations are capable of generating more resources while losing less miners than ever before. The miners rejoice! Well. Not rejoice, exactly. They seem less grumpy than usual. Still, that's something.

StringTable.Label: MasterResourceExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Resource Extraction

StringTable.Label: MasterResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Valuable resources can be found in most asteroids in extremely low concentrations. Extracting these hasn't been practical until the development of probes capable of independently navigating the subsurface to collect the goodies within.

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessMining_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniaturizing our resource extraction probes to the nano-scale has allowed for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. Additionally, the rarest of rare resources can now feasibly be targeted for extraction.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarfareTech_Name
StringTable.String: Warfare

StringTable.Label: MasterWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of weapons technologies.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about who or what we might find in the galaxy. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against a yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: MasterMilitarizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Militarization

StringTable.Label: MasterMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begins us on the path to building a space navy.

StringTable.Label: MasterMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We already have a significant amount of structures in orbit and on the ground, all of which can be militarized with modest extra investment and some new uniforms.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSystemsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: By dedicating their efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, our researchers believe they can deliver a number of more efficient weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Name
StringTable.String: Miniaturization Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Name
StringTable.String: Production Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether light, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of it all at one place.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra-transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage output of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Weapons researchers have to keep paces with advances in many other fields to get the most out of their inventions. Right now, recent advances in material sciences are opening the door to a new generation of more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're a bit more so.

StringTable.Label: MasterMatterDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Matter Disruption

StringTable.Label: MasterMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a collimated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Amplification

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in crystallography have created a new generation of focusing crystals capable of handling much greater quantities of energy without fracturing. All of our beam weapons just got a little bit badder.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of data returned from the field has revealed a number of inefficiencies which we can begin addressing in the next generation of our beam systems. We may also finally be able to get rid of that funny smell they make.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Manufacturing beam weapons is as much art as science, requiring highly trained technicians to individually tune each weapon. But if we can standardize this a bit, and even automate portions of it, we should be able to reduce the cost of each unit.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The heaviest parts of beam weapons have always been the charge coils and their associated cooling equipment. But with the latest generation of super-conductors we can now build these smaller and more compact than ever.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlasmaProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Projection

StringTable.Label: MasterPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to generate collimated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Beam Assembly

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supply chain for the creation of plasma containment fields had a couple of kinks that needed to get worked out, but now that we have, we expect to be able to create beam weapons for far cheaper.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our beam weapons are now absurdly powerful, a terror for anyone foolish enough to get on humanity's wrong side. And yet still our weapon scientists find ways to do better.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the energy density limits that physics allow. If we want any more power per unit of mass, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyPhasing_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Phasing

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.

StringTable.Label: MasterDoomRayTech_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: MasterDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe. So that's good news.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found that the capacity of our beam energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which allows for increased beam output. Such fields could be projected at a distance, improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam outputs. Additionally, we can now build beams that can cripple enemy shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Fire Missiles

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After blowing up several thousand target drones and one unfortunate asteroid, our weapons engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can implement for our missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Missiles

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterHarpoonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Harpoons

StringTable.Label: MasterHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking, and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Acceleration

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: More target drones have given their lives for our glory, and a careful analysis of their deaths has revealed some exciting possibilities in the field of shaped charges, which should improve the destructive yield of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We've spent comparatively little research time on the warhead components of our missile systems, but now that we've turned our attention to the matter, a number of possible efficiencies should be achievable with a little effort.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The most delicate part of missile manufacturing was the warhead, for obvious reasons. But the latest generation of ultra-stable explosives should reduce both manufacturing costs and workplace accidents significantly.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Warheads

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of shaped-charge warheads to reduce the weight of each individual missile, with no corresponding loss of destructive power, we can make room for more missile launchers in total.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonicWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: By embedding a device in our warheads which releases a high-energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing the destructive potential of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Missile Assembly

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile manufacturing facilities are now almost perfectly efficient, wasting no material whatsoever. Destruction shouldn't come so cheap, yet here we are.

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Payload Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Various physical limits of this particular universe prevent us from wringing more destructive potential out of this generation of warheads. But we can certainly make them cheaper and lighter.

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Warheads

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new field based guidance system which uses forcefields to provide final maneuvering capabilities should cut down on the weight of our missiles systems a bit more.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonTorpedos_Name
StringTable.String: Photon Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor piercing technology with our latest anti-matter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: MasterNightmareTorpedoTech_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: MasterNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare Torpedoes at.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship and starbase modules which can improve the tracking and ultimately the range of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedMissileGuidance_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Guidance

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntelligentWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Warheads

StringTable.Label: MasterIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of specifically targeting and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our missile support systems can now make use of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, which allow for more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Range Extension

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some modest improvements in the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons could result in improvements to the cost, mass, or range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantity, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply problems. But that's finally been addressed, and we should see cost savings across all of our kinetic weapon programs.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPulseCannonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: MasterPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Tight clusters of particles emitted at high velocity gets around some of the practical limitations of slug based mass drivers. These pulse cannons have similar tactical characteristics as previous kinetic weapons. They're just more powerful.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Frictionless Acceleration

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newest superconductors and the steeper energy delivery curves they enable should lead to higher muzzle velocities, at the tradeoff of smaller projectiles. These weapons should have a longer effective range with no reduction in damage potential.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Acceleration Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent advances in superconducting technology should lead to improvements in the critical energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Accelerators

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of superconducting electromagnetic coils and their less-strenuous cooling requirements make them much less fragile to handle. We expect to see significant cost savings now that we won't break as many during production.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Accelerators

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new ultra-low resistance electromagnets generate a lot more kick per unit weight, leading to lower mass accelerators. We can feel free to cram more of them into whatever we're cramming them in to.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonThrower_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Thrower

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By launching pulses of gravitons, we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of enemy ships that they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage, and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy right before they die.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Accelerator Assembly

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: "We Make Kinetic Weapons Faster," is probably the dumbest slogan ever conceived of, but the factory workers seem really proud of it, so no-one had the heart to tell them. And to be fair, they do make them really quite quickly and cheaply now.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: After several generations of whipping things at other things as fast as possible, our scientists are now really quite good at it. There remain but a few small efficiencies to wring out of the field.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Accelerators

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have all but mastered kinetic weapons, having made them as mass efficient as theoretically possible, allowing even our smallest vessels to pack a hellacious punch.

StringTable.Label: MasterQuantumDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers

StringTable.Label: MasterQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterSingularityDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers

StringTable.Label: MasterSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro singularities that collapse into existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. And our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better.

StringTable.Label: MasterInertialMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Inertial Magnification

StringTable.Label: MasterInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCombatTechniques_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Combat Techniques

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCombatTechniques_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks the General specialization who can train legions for either defense or for invading other planets.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCombatTechniques_Dec
StringTable.String: Planets come in all shapes and sizes. And smells. This technology will begin the process of teaching our soldiers how to deal with alien environments.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarMachine_Name
StringTable.String: War College

StringTable.Label: MasterWarMachine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows training of Commanders

StringTable.Label: MasterWarMachine_Dec
StringTable.String: Only the best of the best can go to the war college. The end result are an elite breed of leader, the Commander.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Dimensional Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Attack of all weapons types.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: By pulling power from extra-dimensional sources we can make our weapons exceed the limitation of this universe's laws.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Shifting

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Through dimensional shifting we are able to make our beam weapons target slightly into the future, greatly increasing their accuracy.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Dimensional Shifting Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: By manipulating dimensional shift we can make our weapons systems more accurate.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Shifting

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Through dimensional shifting we are able to make our missile weapons target slightly into the future, greatly increasing their accuracy.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Shifting

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Through dimensional shifting we are able to make our kinetic weapons target slightly into the future, greatly increasing their accuracy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTerritorialReinforcement_Name
StringTable.String: Territorial Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: MasterTerritorialReinforcement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of special military starbase modules that can be built on any starbase.

StringTable.Label: MasterTerritorialReinforcement_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent experiences have taught us that the best way to ensure our planets remain unmolested is to keep our enemies far, far away from them. By adding military capacity to even our most utilitarian starbases, we will ensure our forces always have a safe place to rally and resupply.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the hitpoints of all Starbases

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: As our Empire expands, we find it increasingly important to ensure that our starbases are well protected, able to withstand raids from the most aggressive pirates.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforcement Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Starbase Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Starbase commanders have great political power, and insist more resources be spent on increasing their defensive capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Guardians

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases receive 2 Intercepter drones to augment their exsiting defenses.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Every weapon counts when it comes to defending Arcean territory. By installing Interceptor drones on all existing starbases, we're able to better secure our territory and resources.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Fortification

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Alows for the building of the Intersteller Defense Module on any starbase.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research teams have found a way to install military grade defense augmentation systems on non-military starbases. With this breakthrough, we should be able to better secure our borders and protect our worlds and assets.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Battle Coordination

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the weapons strength of all weapons on our starbases

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Using a recent breakthrough in field-of-fire coordination, we have been able to design a firmware update for our starbase defense modules that increases the damage dealt by existing weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Fortification Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Starbase Fortifications

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Arcean people grow anxious at the threats the galaxy poses, and insist that more resources be spent to increase our Empire's fortifications.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Defense Coordination

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the defenses of all starbases

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new scaled-up version of our integrity field strengthening technology allows us to boost the overall defenses of all of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterZalonDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zalon Defense System

StringTable.Label: MasterZalonDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Build the Zalon Defense system on a starbase or ship.

StringTable.Label: MasterZalonDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research efforts into starbase fortification have proven quite fruitful. The Zalon Defense System will not only be the most advanced 'civilian' starbase defense array in the known galaxy, it will also be small enough to be equipped on a ship.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed. Provides 10 legions.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. A little hard to imagine it, but we must accept that humans are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Bombardment

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun itself.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Invasion Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Good news! We've developed some new, possibly amoral, certainly effective techniques for pacifying enemy ground forces.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Warfare

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal. But EMPs and targeted hacking attacks can cripple an enemy's coordination and limit the effectiveness of their defenses without needing to risk any of our own viscera.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Biological Warfare

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Let's be honest. If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to pretend we're the good guys. Yes we'll have to live with the consequences of using biological weapons. But at least we'll be the ones who live.

StringTable.Label: MasterStallerMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: MasterStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tidal Disruption

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitational Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces. These are powerful weapons we're giving to guys with pretty thick skulls, so we should definitely remember to keep an eye on them.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Core Detonation

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any hostiles. Also liquefy them.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: There are massive benefits in unit reliability and coordination if our troops are programmed to unfailingly do what we tell them to. And we won't have to feel so bad about losing these ones.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedInvasionTactics_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Invasion Tactics

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of invasion transports, along with a new generation of soldiers that don't mind being stacked like firewood, allows us to put boots on the ground faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Meditation

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Champion's Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_Dec
StringTable.String: The Champion's Temple trains Altarians the intricacies of various martial techniques, and the reason why even an enlightened species must sometimes use force to defend the weak.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionTech_Name
StringTable.String: Acquisitions

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase starbase range, and Awards one free Frigate.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our business must grow. And when the galaxy doesn't provide us empty worlds to grow with, we may have to acquire them from other parties. Developing the tools and techniques to do that now is more than prudent.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Quality

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicating internal R and D resources to improving the effectiveness of our weapons systems will ensure that when our security forces need to use them, they won't need to use them twice.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Acquisition Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our military systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our security forces will have a much easier time acquiring other assets if the tools they use to do so are the best they can be.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Quality

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our defensive systems.
