StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A concentrated focus to improve the defensive technologies which protect our security fleets will ensure that those valuable assets aren't wasted when conducting security or acquisition operations.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Ship Quality

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the hit points of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Making the ships used by our security fleets more durable will increase their effectiveness and staying power in high-risk security or acquisition operations.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadTech_Name
StringTable.String: Jihad

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Holy War to commence.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is filled with close-minded individuals who resist being shown the Path, or even struggle against it. They must be dealt with harshly. Our own salvation rests on their conversion.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Warriors

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Soldiering Ability.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that follow The Path of Shadows understand that when Force is called for, it must be total, overwhelming, and unstoppable. When the unbelievers meet our Shadow Warriors they shall see the truth of the Path firsthand.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Krynniac Jihad

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves planetary Holy War capabilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that fallow the Path have no fear, their faith filling them with confidence and a strength that can be used against the unbelievers in a variety of ways.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Devout Defenders

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Planetary Defense

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path teaches that when our lives and salvation are under threat, everyone that walks the Path, regardless of caste or clan, must defend the Way to their dying breath.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Steadfast Faith

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Planets resist culture flipping much longer.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path teaches that it is the only acceptable means of finding salvation, and that the customs of unbelievers should be shunned, as they are anathema to the Way.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_Name
StringTable.String: Divine Fleets

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Divine Temple Support Module.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_Dec
StringTable.String: Divine Temples can be installed on appropriately anointed vessels, providing all ships in a fleet a certainty of purpose that they are fighting a righteous cause.

StringTable.Label: MasterUndauntedCrews_Name
StringTable.String: Undaunted Crews

StringTable.Label: MasterUndauntedCrews_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Hit points of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterUndauntedCrews_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who truly walk the Path do not feel the pains inflicted by the world, and will not panic when a ship is crumbling around them, standing and fighting until their last breath.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Divine Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves ship based Holy War capabilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Crews and officers that fully master the Path and comprehend the Way in all its beauty will find that the weapons of the unbelievers hold less menace for them.

StringTable.Label: MasterRighteousStrength_Name
StringTable.String: Righteous Strength

StringTable.Label: MasterRighteousStrength_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the defenses of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterRighteousStrength_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's due to the ingenuity of our crews, or the intervention of a higher power, our dedication to the Path gives our ship's defenses a righteous strength that helps protect against even the most devastating attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTempleofValorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Temple of Valor

StringTable.Label: MasterTempleofValorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the building of the Temple of Valor Improvement.

StringTable.Label: MasterTempleofValorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying the great warriors of our past, our children learn the importance of Valor, giving them an ideal to look up to, and a way to focus their more aggressive tendencies.

StringTable.Label: MasterVicious_Name
StringTable.String: Vicious

StringTable.Label: MasterVicious_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Soldiering and Resistance.

StringTable.Label: MasterVicious_Dec
StringTable.String: The Snathi know that being small makes us vulnerable to the larger races. However, we make up for our size with pure viciousness. There are many advantages to always starting a battle with a low blow.

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_Name
StringTable.String: Unbroken Spirt

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the Hitpoints of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_Dec
StringTable.String: Our crews have tasted the lash of slavery, but they have not broken. Now they and their ships have the ability to withstand even the harshest onslaughts.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Discipline

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes our ship crews more effective when in defensive maneuvers.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_Dec
StringTable.String: Our pilots have learned to link with their ships, and though disciplined thoughts, they can now maneuver their ships, with a nimbleness far beyond normal manual control.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Trance

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increase the abilities of our ships to withstand damage.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more gifted pilots have taken the Defensive Discipline to a new level. They can go into a trance, becoming one with their ships. Allowing them to control their ships like their own bodies. The end result is they are able to move through intensive fire without faltering.

StringTable.Label: MasterFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Fortification

StringTable.Label: MasterFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't neglect our own defenses, and with the latest generation of defensive fortifications, our planets and starbases will be able to put up a much tougher fight.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Bombardment Shelters

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Planetary Bombardment.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By moving our most critical structures underground, and providing similar shelters for civilians and troops, we can dramatically limit the effectiveness of most forms of orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion defenses.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military theoreticians have analyzed reports of the latest invasion tactics in use in the galaxy and come up with a number of elegant ways to counter them.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Systems Hardening

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Information Warfare.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our defensive experts have identified a number of vulnerabilities in our ground-based C and C systems, and urgently recommend that we harden them.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Vaccinations

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Biological Warfare.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to conventionally vaccinate against an unknown biological attack. Adaptive vaccines are engineered lifeforms that lie dormant, ready to rapidly assist a immune system to fight new infections the moment they appear.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalDefencePlatform_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Defense Platform

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and take some of the defensive responsibility off of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryDefenseDome_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defense Dome

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a shielded dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Naval crews are notoriously squishy, and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to do something, or they're going to stop getting in the ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Deflecting or diffusing incoming weapon fire is really, really hard, and we're far from having a really good understanding of it. Our latest round of research has only succeeded in making existing shield systems a bit cheaper to build.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: After studying the wreckage of a few vessels we've lost in combat, our engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can make to our defensive technologies.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of point defenses.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our point defenses fire more crap into the space around the ship is a simple solution to a complicated question. Though still a surprisingly effective one.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By adjusting the size and positioning of our armor panels, we've been able to minimize overlap and other inefficiencies, and can now provide the same level of protection to our ships for less overall weight.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be the most popular. So we've done that.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've received quite a bit of useful data on real world performance of our shield systems, and have devised several possible improvements we can begin making to them.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The first few generation of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier Field Generation

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields, the so-called Barrier Field, is capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it. This dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The first generation of energy absorbers in our Barrier Field systems used a model of capacitor which occasionally exploded violently. Crews had decidedly mixed feelings about this, so we replaced those capacitors with a slightly more robust model.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier System Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful design review of our initial implementation of the Barrier Field system has revealed a number of possible avenues for further improvements. Who says design reviews are unexciting?

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Since the first few shield emitters went out the door, we've slowly been able to achieve some economies of scale in the manufacture of these systems, reducing the cost of all future installations.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We've recently been able to shave a ton of weight off of our shield generators thanks to the latest generation of superconductors and their less extensive cooling requirements.

StringTable.Label: MasterForceFieldTech_Name
StringTable.String: Force Fields

StringTable.Label: MasterForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Shield Assembly

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Cheaper shields never meant less effective shields, and it's only taken a few decades for our crews to finally understand that. Which is good, because our shields are spectacularly cheap now.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shielding technology approaches perfection, our engineers pushing the capabilities of our shield systems right to their theoretical limits.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: It's impossible to make the energy emitters of our shields any denser our engineers claim. They claim that kind of thing a lot and always take it back later, but they seem pretty sure this time.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvulnerabilityTech_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability

StringTable.Label: MasterInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: "Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields. But those would be some pretty terrifying weapons, and even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Support Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment the shields of friendly ships. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of the energy fields needed to create and maintain shields has resulted in a couple interesting new technologies, capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, or massively shielding friendly units within range.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Arrays of tiny computer controlled railguns that track and destroy incoming missiles are unparalleled at protecting ships and starbases from missile attacks, though they still aren't terribly helpful at defending against other classes of weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of various missile performance envelopes has led us to adjust the firing patterns of our point defense systems, making them a bit more effective.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our point defense systems should lead to a number of different performance gains. Like possibly less exploded ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor equipment our point defense systems use is fairly specialized equipment that was initially quite rare and costly. Now that we're building a lot of point defenses, the price of those systems is starting to come down.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The slugs fired by point defenses don't need to be large, and were limited by the fact that we couldn't build railguns any smaller. But now that we can build more compact units, we should see significant weight savings for all our point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: By deploying electronic counter measures which interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, we've greatly increased the survivability of our ships and starbases. Against missiles at least. Still hard to confuse a laser.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's always a generational game of leap frog being played between missile designers and ECM designers, but we believe our latest algorithms have given us the leg up on the bad guys this time.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have some field data on ECM suite performance, we've identified a number of different ways we can improve upon the design and construction of those systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest attempts at ECM suites were heavily customizable, requiring a great deal of hand tuning to make them perform at their best. Now that we know what works, we can automate much more of the manufacturing and installation process.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first ECM suites were cobbled together from a half dozen different processors and transmitters. We've since streamlined those into a single unit which weighs much less.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSentrySystems_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Sentry Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: By installing our point defense systems on drone platforms that orbit our ships at a distance, we can add a valuable extra layer of protection against missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Point Defense Assembly

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: To be fair, only a few of our drone systems have ever actually shot each other in combat situations. But by minimizing that just a little bit more, we should be able to make our point defenses a little more cost-effective, if a bit less funny.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Drone System Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems dramatically increased the sheer volume of our point defense capabilities, so any small improvement in their design should lead to significant cost or weight savings.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we realized point defense drones don't need much personal space, we were able to start packing them in a lot tighter.

StringTable.Label: MasterArreonMissileDefenseTech_Name
StringTable.String: Aereon Missile Defense

StringTable.Label: MasterArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in point defense technology, featuring the latest generation of micro-drones armed with railguns, ECM and smart chafe. Aereon systems fill the space around a ship with a cloud of debris so thick no enemy missiles are likely to survive.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseSupportSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Support

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience working with small scale point defenses has led to a type of long range missile tracking system which should enhance the point defense capabilities of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Wide area missile disruptors enhance the effectiveness of our existing counter measures, adding a much needed layer of extra missile security to our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleet-wide drone systems will provide massive missile security to an entire fleet. Additionally, we can now equip point defense disruptors, essentially a type of counter-counter-measure, which should boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: A big lump of ultra-dense material remains an effective, if unsubtle, method of protection from modern space-based weaponry. Subtlety is overrated though.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforced Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A simple mistake by one of our fabricators resulted in a set of armor panels marginally denser and more resilient than we'd seen before. It took us a long time to replicate that mistake, but now that we have, our ships should be a little tougher to kill.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've blown up lots and lots of slabs of armor on the test range, and have come up with a few possible improvements we could make to our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest challenges with armor manufacturing was simply the logistics of moving rare and heavy resources and materials around. Now that we've got our supply chain sorted out, we can expect to see some nice cost savings.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By its very nature, armor is always going to be a mass-intensive means of protection. That said, we can do a few things to improve the precision and fit of armor plating, which should cut down on weight a bit.

StringTable.Label: MasterDurantiumCompositeTech_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Composite

StringTable.Label: MasterDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Certain materials, when stacked in specific arrangements have a synergistic effect on the strength of their neighbors under compressive forces. We call these new composites Durantium, and they should tremendously increase the survivability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Lamination

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful study of battle-damaged ships has revealed previously unknown weaknesses in our armor systems. Basically, we know why some of them were cracking in half now. We'll do something about that right away.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor systems have increased significantly in complexity, and our efforts to model their behavior under impact is only now catching up. This research should help lead to more effective or efficient designs.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If our crews ask, it's not that our armor is cheap. It's that we've found a more efficient way of manufacturing it. But yes, it is pretty cheap.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the arrangement of our Durantium composites has revealed that we can get away with slightly less dense materials at certain layers with no impact to the armor's effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: MasterKanviumLaminateTech_Name
StringTable.String: Kanvium Laminate

StringTable.Label: MasterKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor uses a new type of lamination which causes surrounding materials to partially fluidize on impact, deforming in a recoverable way. Impacts are spread out over a much larger area, then flow back into its original shape.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Armorers

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: With modern armoring systems, the design of the armor informs the shape of the ship as much as the other way around. Properly armoring a ship involves a complicated series of tradeoffs, which when we get right, mean ships protected for much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of hardening techniques is almost complete, and the galaxy trembles at the girth of our vessels. But even perfection can be improved upon it seems. Some more effort should lead to cheaper or more efficient armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: On a weight basis, our armor systems are now as efficient as they can possibly be, 99.3% of all total installed mass dedicated to offensive energy absorption or dispersion. That's really, really good the researchers promise.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroPointArmorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Point Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have a hard time proving zero-point armor even exists, only knowing of it by the effect it has. It appears to tap into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum to repulse incoming energy. It's almost impossibly tough, we can prove that much.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Support Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: In the factory, we've begun producing armor plating with a variety of force field based technologies. By adapting these fields into ship modules, we can create a hardening effect at a distance, making every ship in a fleet substantially more durable.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The fields that we use to generate hardening effects have twenty-seven different "poles" which can be cycled through, changing the alignment of the hardening effects in the affected material, generating substantially stronger, more resilient materials.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntegrityFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Integrity Field Projection

StringTable.Label: MasterIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest generation of armoring fields no longer just generate hardening effects at a distance, but can induce material fluidization and shape recovery. These new Integrity Fields can make our fleets invulnerable to all but the most powerful attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of communications technologies.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. Which presents an incredible danger, but also, perhaps, an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin communicating with aliens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Intense study of the fragments of alien text and speech has allowed us to create a Universal Translator that will let us communicate with any new races we come across.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Reasoning

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases our Diplomatic ability with other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've begun simulating different rhetorical and diplomatic approaches when dealing with aliens, revealing several ways we might improve their attitudes towards us. Our role-playing has enabled us to talk prettier, essentially.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves diplomatic effects.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The words we use have a limited ability to affect the way we think, and by studying the vocabulary used by our neighbors, we may unlock valuable insights into their mindsets. And possibly even find out how to manipulate them.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Influential Voice

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on all our colonies.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our culture has a way of communicating what our diplomats cannot. By increasing the ease with which other civilizations can access our culture we can win hearts and minds before we even get to the negotiating table.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Administrators

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the number of Administrators your Civilization can support.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: As our Civilization grows, we find ourselves needing more and more Administrators to oversee our far flung Starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a leader and increases administration.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization on this scale parallels our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. A history we'd better refamiliarize ourselves with quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in our harbors.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Federalist Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Federalist Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Federalist parties advocate a relatively weak central government that offloads much of its responsibility to lower, more local governmental groups. This bias towards local regulation seems to encourage economic development.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Political Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are several broad ways to organize the government of a space faring civilization, all of which pose distinct advantages and disadvantages. Rest assured, there's no right choice here; regardless of what we pick, everyone will tell us that we made the wrong choice.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Populist Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Populist Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Populist forms of government are designed to make people happy, even at the cost of economic strength. As a side-effect of this relentless interest in pleasing others, Populist governments are often very good at diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Universalist Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Universalist Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Universalist governments attempt to be all things to all people. That can be a lot of people, none of whom ever seem to agree on anything, but a balanced approach like this at least ensures a government has no weak spots.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a free leader and 3 more administrative points.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By granting limited powers of self-rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and all the benefits which come with it.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Industrialist Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Industrialist Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Industrialist governments seek to maximize industrial capacity by rewarding citizens based entirely on their productivity. From top to bottom, society is organized to encourage hard work and not having fun.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Political Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As we continue to manage, and often mis-manage, our affairs, it's become clear that a number of political theories we'd never previously considered viable might actually be very practical when practiced on a galactic scale.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Mercantile Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Mercantile Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Mercantilists seek to ensure their civilization's prosperity through trade, via careful negotiations, brutally unfair tariff, and outright espionage.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Technologist Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Technologist Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Any time two civilizations have met the less technologically advanced one has come out worse from the encounter. Technologists dedicate all governmental resources to ensure that they never become that dumber civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarDemocracyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Democracy

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a free leader and 3 more administraive points.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has obvious merits in terms of approval and productivity, although adapting it to a civilization this big has proven challenging.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: War Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of War Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's because they consider all other civilizations to be inferior, or simply terrifying, members of the War Party are willing to put their entire civilization on a military footing to do something about it.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Political Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks political parties.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Coordinating the direction of an entire galactic civilization is tremendously difficult. But thanks to advances in deceit and brain injection technology, we can now put this whole show entirely on a war footing, or, if we choose, the exact opposite.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Pacifist Party

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Pacifist Party.

StringTable.Label: MasterPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pacifist governments forego the language of aggression and militarization and focus all their efforts on promoting culture and social welfare. This makes them well liked in the galactic community, and their words travel far.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarFederationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Star Federation

StringTable.Label: MasterStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a free leader and 3 more administraive points.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomacy

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties. Provides a Diplomat.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The profit potential an alliance with our neighbors offers is something we should always consider. And failing that, the cost of talking with them will be a fraction of the cost of going to war with then.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Treaty

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of economic treaties.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic treaties will lower tariffs and other obstacles that discourage business activities. When well designed, these treaties should result in increased wealth for both parties.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced treaties.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Depending on the current state of our civilization, we profit more from some types of treaties than others, and should begin slanting our diplomatic posture in those directions right away.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Treaty

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of cultural treaties.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By increasing the interchange of cultural products and making it easier for civilians to cross borders, we can hope to increase the influence we have on our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Treaty

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of research treaties.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By entering into formal information sharing agreements with other civilizations, our researchers can more easily accumulate the masses of data which modern research often requires.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarAlliances_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Alliances

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: Turning a friendly species into a formal ally is a supremely delicate process. There's only one way these talks can go right, and a thousand ways they can go wrong. The etiquette of alien handshakes alone is fraught with peril.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Alliance

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of military alliances.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Formal military alliances will make a war with humanity that much more imposing to our foes. The trade-off is that we risk being drawn into wars not of our choosing. Friends are cheap to have, but allies can be very expensive indeed.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Alliance Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced alliances.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Alliances come in a variety of flavors, some of which may be more advantageous to us than others. We should consider our civilization's priorities - and what our new ally is actually good for - before entering such talks.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Alliance

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of technological alliances.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A technological alliance will dramatically ramp up the research sharing programs we have with our ally. This is valuable information, so we must be sure of their friendship before entering such an agreement.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Alliance

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of cultural alliances.

StringTable.Label: MasterAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal cultural alliance will lower almost all barriers to the movement of people and ideas across borders with our neighbor. Not only will this bring us closer, we can hope to have a bigger influence on our neighbor's culture.

StringTable.Label: MasterEminenceTech_Name
StringTable.String: Eminence

StringTable.Label: MasterEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: MasterEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A civilization which takes diplomacy seriously and has a long record of fair-minded dealing will always carry a greater voice at the bargaining table. Our people are building that reputation now, and are stronger for it.

StringTable.Label: MasterMajestyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Majesty

StringTable.Label: MasterMajestyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of assimilation treaties.

StringTable.Label: MasterMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy wants to believe every word we say. So sterling is our reputation, that our diplomats often find whole worlds begging to join our culture. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Espionage

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the training of Agents that can be used to destabilize and surveille other Races.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more conniving Researchers have been able to put together a training program for the training of Espionage Agents. If we are willing to build some training centers for these Agents we should soon be able to keep a better eye on what other races are up to, and even make things a bit more difficult for them if we don't like it.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Espionage Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All Spies gain one additional level

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Smarter spies, are more effective when destabilizing our enemies.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Espionage Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Surveillance Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the sensor range of all our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A key part of espionage is to make sure we see what our enemies are up to before their fleets are at our doorstep.

StringTable.Label: MasterDestabilizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Destabilization

StringTable.Label: MasterDestabilizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gain one free Agent

StringTable.Label: MasterDestabilizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our espionage efforts are starting to pay off, we are even starting to get volunteers wanting join our efforts.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Training

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All Spies gain one additional level

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Enough of our Agents have now survived their tours of duty, to come back to our worlds with tips and tricks for the next generation. These new instructors are able to prepare our new agents for the missions much more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Espionage Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Agents

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the sensor range of all our Starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Surveillance Post on starbases can give us an even bigger edge when watching for suspicious activity from our neighbors.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarSurveillance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Surveillance

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarSurveillance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to Recurite spies on our colonies.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarSurveillance_Dec
StringTable.String: As our colonies grow we are they begin to attract citizens with the proper temperament for espionage, with a bit of effort we can turn them into excellent agents.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Agent Training Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All Spies gain one additional level

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Espionage network has become so efficient, that we can now train spies that are almost as effective as agents who have spent years in the field.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Espionage Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Surveillance

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Further boost the sensor range of all our Colonies and Starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Surveillance abilities have reached the point where even our most remote Colonies and Starbases can no longer be surprised.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Espionage Masters

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of all our spies by 2

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Spies are now the best in the universe, and can cripple even the most prosperous planet.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Commerce

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which spans the stars is a pretty complicated beast. We don't need to understand it all of course, just supply the facilities and light regulations for the free market to get to work doing what it does best.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Wealthy Population

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases wealth.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: With targeted tax rates, we can encourage a number of different areas of our economy. A tax policy which favors business and investment should ultimately lead to a wealthier economy for example. Unless the businesses and investors were lying to us.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Commerce Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases economic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience managing and regulating markets on a massive scale, we're now able to target specific economic improvements we might like to see.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Supportive Population

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By targeting economic policy to support workers and the civilian population in general, we can ensure we have a much broader base of approval to build our civilization on.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Designated Trading Partner

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds trade route.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Encouraging and supporting trade is a great way to both bring in extra income and forge closer ties with our neighbors. Everyone's happy when they're making money.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalExchange_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Exchange

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading your cultural influence across the galaxy and earning a profit from it.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalExchange_Dec
StringTable.String: Every parsec that falls under our influence represents an opportunity to persaude those who are exposed to it to our way of life.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Influence

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence. Provides a Celebrity.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: A strong cultural presence, on our worlds and our neighbors' has tremendous long term potential. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective at securing humanity's future.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Representation

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our culture has made inroads on the planets of our neighbors, we can help cement this influence by encouraging our biggest stars to regularly visit and vacation there, serving as ambassadors for our way of life.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Representation

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Although artists and designers aren't naturally inclined towards thinking about money, after we locked a few of them in a room with an accountant for a bit, they managed to find a number of ways they could do their work more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Self Sufficient Representation

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural facilities cost real money to maintain. By encouraging our artists and directors to reuse materials, props, and punch lines whenever possible, we can reduce the ongoing costs of running these enterprises.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see even more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Research-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on research planets.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By adapting our cultural products to cast scientists and researchers in a more favorable light, we might find appreciative audiences among research communities.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases influence on specific worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Few works of art and cultural artifacts have broad appeal, and it's often necessary to target one's audience to some extent. By fine tuning the tone and content of our cultural products, we might appeal to demographics which are particularly valuable to us.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Approval-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which focuses on its leaders is a fine thing to have when those leaders are doing a good job. When the leaders aren't doing a good job, it's filled with harsh satire and unflattering impressions, so watch out for that.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Wealth-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on wealthy planets.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If people have money, let's not make them ashamed of it. By encouraging displays of conspicuous consumption and a culture which celebrates wealth, we can gain a great deal of influence with people living the good life.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarEmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Emigration

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Humans are admired throughout the galaxy, reflecting the success of our civilization. If we can make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAssimilation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Assimilation

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: Foreign cultures have such backwards ideas that we'll find great value in quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals. By doing so can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more still.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalDomination_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Domination

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no other culture in the galaxy but ours, and anyone who claims otherwise is a heretic. Or just dumb. All sane beings will soon bow down before our celebrities and thinkers.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAffinity_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Affinity

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAffinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Other universes deserve the benefit of humanity's wisdom and culture. Indeed, it's a bit offensive that they don't see it already. Our thinkers are now beginning to prepare plans for shining our light on the next world, and beyond.

StringTable.Label: MasterTechnologicalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterTechnologicalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly Increases the spread of our colonies Influence for 15 Turns. (Capstone)

StringTable.Label: MasterTechnologicalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been instructed to bend those giant brains of Thiers toward finding ways to reach out to the scientist and researchers of other races, and find ways to convince them our way of doing things is the best way to insure technological advancement for the galaxy as a whole.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArcheology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Archeology

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time, we've known of a race, or races, of long dead aliens called the Precursors. It's taken some time to adapt our survey systems to identify their relics, but now that we have, we hope to learn a few of their secrets.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've had an opportunity to study a few precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns in them which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Technologist

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic research benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding Precursor artifacts involves throwing out many of our pre-conceived notions about technology. Their interfaces don't just assume we have different anatomy; they assume we have different ways of thinking entirely.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Precursor relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Having captured a few Precursor relics and observed the impact they have on our research and culture, we can now try adjusting our Precursor studies to benefit specific areas of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Cultural Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic cultural benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The public seems fascinated by the Precursors, and the relics we've found have had a surprising effect on our society. We can now try to capitalize on these cultural benefits. Souvenirs. Wacky catchphrases. Things like that.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Capitalization

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic economic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of the Precursor relics we find are a mystery to us, doing little more than generating patterns of pretty lights. Though it turns out there is a massive consumer market for pretty lights which we might want to capitalize on.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorExploitation_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Exploitation

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Engineering

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to try recreating some of the Precursor's technology. Extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to continue this work, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Understanding

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor relics reveal their secrets to us with ease now, and we're close to building our own relics ourselves. We have almost as full an understanding of Precursor technology as the Precursors did themselves.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Path

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Temple and Ministry.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path is the primary doctrine of the ancient Krynniac religion. It is the set of core teachings, ideals, and laws that the Krynn must live by to bring them closer to learning the true Way of the universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Calling

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Mission.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Once a Krynn has commenced along the Path, the next step is for them to find his or her Calling. It is though service to their Calling that the Krynn contribute to the overarching goal of our people, spreading the Krynniac Way.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Order

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Order and Sanctuary.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Orders were founded to help Krynn take the last step on the Path, and find the Way. These Orders are the glue which hold the Krynn together, ensuring the Krynniac Way will eventually be found by all.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Way

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Oracle.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: At the end of the Path one finds the Way. The Way reveals the truth of our universe to those who behold it, and teaches those so enlightened that they must forever help others walk the Path, until all beings in the universe live as one.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection1_Name
StringTable.String: The Way of Leadership

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that follow the Way must be able to educate and influence the lost. A select few choose to walk the Way of Leadership, to better equip them for securing the future of the Krynn, and all sentient life.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection_Name
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Way

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enlightens our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who have found the Way understand the importance of convincing the entire galaxy to walk the Path along with us. We must do anything we can do to support their work.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection2_Name
StringTable.String: The Way of Bliss

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way of Bliss teaches that for the Krynn to bring all sentient life to the Path we must achieve perfect harmony within our own civilization first.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEconomics_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Economics

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings. Grants an Entrepreneur.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer distance between buyers and sellers in this economy has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics. At minimum, some new banking and economic structures will be required to deal with all the complications.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarBanking_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Banking

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Capital can now be transferred instantaneously. This has allowed a variety of creative arbitrage opportunities, which will require new regulations and banking theory to contain.

StringTable.Label: MasterEconomicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Economy

StringTable.Label: MasterEconomicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases trade route income.

StringTable.Label: MasterEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which prioritizes external trading will be well suited to exploit the wealth of the greater galactic community, or just exploit the greater galactic community in general.

StringTable.Label: MasterEconomicFocus_Name
